titles.title: Save our Border Communities Act of 2011
To authorize Federal payment to first responders for costs associated with providing emergency services at the international borders of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E314)

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
